item.title: aaand Proposal Accepted !!!
item.dc:creator: punyaslokpattnaik
item.description: After waiting (very) anxiously for the results (and refreshing the page hundreds of times to see, if, by any chance the results were out before 1900 UTC), officially I am in !!! Now I will be working as a student developer under GSoC for SunPy. I would like to thank Cadair, DavidPS and especially de ...READ MORE...

item.title: Improvements to the SunPy database
item.dc:creator: punyaslokpattnaik
item.description: I found the “Improvements to the SunPy database” project interesting among the ideas present in SunPy’s wiki page. This project appealed to me the most because it would integrate Fido into SunPy’s database, which in turn would really open up the SunPy’s database module to a world of possibilities. T ...READ MORE...

item.title: My first contact with SunPy
item.dc:creator: punyaslokpattnaik
item.description: I first contacted SunPy through their IRC channel because I found one of their ideas interesting. Being a newbie to the world of Open Source, I was at first intimidated by the “Intermediate” difficulty tag of the project.
